text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Send every Indians to their destination in next 14 days. population of 20- 55 age to go for work & get immuned. close non essential inst to reduce rush in trains,bus,air.  Keep India moving & we are sure to be winner against #coronavirus under your leadership
